comments.content: It must be **[Perpetua](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724032655/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Perpetua%20-%20Regular&fid=aee7d662434e4c478775b1faea801a7f&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=VARIATION%20FQ&fit=1)** by Eric Gill [1928?] available from Monotype & Adobe
